channel.title: Opening Doors
channel.description:
Hey hey hey! Its Santa here. :D. Alright so i got a new home thats BIGGGG but the problem is..few of the doors dont open..And i was planning to put shops in there! :(. So I need YOUR help. :D I got examples..
This door... [IMG]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj53/Save_Some_Time/door1.png[/img]
Into This.. [IMG]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj53/Save_Some_Time/door2.png[/img]
[b][i][u][s]ORRRRRR[/s][/u][/i][/b]
That when you click the door it opens into picture 2 :)
If you know please post back...I help people on threads when i know and i don't even get thank you's...-.-

item.title: Opening Doors
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

Dude i love you so much…I opened my Config folder and i found objects…So i open it and was about to close it…Then it said open? Im like…WTF? and below it says false and true and w\e…So i see some coords and i tele there…I open the door…And it opened…So i found out thats where u edit it…And dude…I luv you…Thx so much.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 06:19:48 PM[/size][hr]Acutally when i added it to objects it didnt work…It didnt stay open OR open when u click…

Read full topic

item.title: Opening Doors
item.dc:creator: @HazzardScape HazzardScape
item.description:
@HazzardScape wrote:

i was the first person to use that area as a starting place and i had the same proplem and the anser is …go to varrock find a door that works remember the case then go to client look it up copy the case paste it underneeth then change the case number to that doors case then u will see like a -4 or somthing and change it to +20 on both of them or any high number and im sure it would work =]

Read full topic

item.title: Opening Doors
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

If you’re using Devolution go into The “Config” folder and then open doors.cfg.
There will be door id and face and original state fields to put which direction you want the door to open.

Simply just copy the previous line and fill it in accordingly. There will be a legend up top which tells you which digit represents which direction and what each word means, Just fill in whihc way you want the door to open, the direction you want it open before anyone clicks it, the direction it swings when you open it, etc.

Hope i helped

Read full topic
